snippet: The Conservative-led coalition government hopes voters see the new growth as a vindication of austerity policies.
abstract: Great Britain crosses an important economic and psychological threshold when growth in paychecks catches up with inflation after years of financial crisis, austerity and an accompanying dip in living standards; Conservative-led coalition government hopes that voters see turnaround in the economy as vindication of government austerity policies.
lead_paragraph: The Conservative-led coalition government hopes voters see the new growth as a vindication of austerity policies.

headline.main: British Government Seeks Lift From Economic Data
headline.print_headline: British Government Seeks Lift From Economic Data
